articles.description: ITI formed robust bullish candlestick pattern on the daily timeframe with strong volumes on Wednesday. The stock gained more than 60 percent during the current week.
articles.content: Bulls seem to have charged up after a day of consolidation, pushing the market beyond the 20,000 mark on the Nifty, at close on September 13. This rally was backed by banks. The index can march towar… [+3494 chars]

articles.title: IndusInd Bank settles default dispute with Coffee Day Global | Mint - Mint
articles.description: IndusInd Bank settles debt with Coffee Day Global, withdraws insolvency petition.
articles.content: Mumbai: IndusInd Bank on Wednesday informed the National Company Law Appellate Tribunal (NCLAT) that it has reached a settlement with Coffee Day Global and has withdrawn the insolvency petition again… [+1869 chars]
